channel.title: The Miler Lab
channel.description: Recent content on The Miler Lab

item.title: About The Miller Lab
item.description: About David Miller, MD, PhD David M. Miller, MD, PhD is a board-certified Dermatologist and Internist, as well as a board-eligible Hematologist and Medical Oncologist. Dr. Miller graduated with Honors from Boston College where he earned a BA in Political Science. He received his medical (MD) and PhD degree in Biomedical Sciences from the University of Massachusetts. While at UMass, Dr. Miller received the American Diabetes Association Physician-Scientist Training Award for three consecutive years, a Fuller Foundation grant, and he was inducted into the Alpha Omega Honor Society.

item.title: About Dr. Miller
item.description: David Michael Miller, MD, PhD, FAAD is an Instructor in Dermatology and Medicine at Harvard Medical School and member of the Department of Dermatology and the Department of Medicine at Massachusetts General Hospital, where he is co-director of the Merkel cell carcinoma treatment program. Dr. Miller graduated with Honors from Boston College where he earned a BA in Political Science. He received his medical (MD) and PhD degree in Biomedical Sciences from the University of Massachusetts.
